name: restaurant_id
description: Unique identifier of the Partner, defined by PedidosYa

name: restaurant_name
description: Partners short name, also known as fantasy name

name: restaurant_state_id
description: Identifier of current partner state

name: restaurant_type_id
description: Identifier of current partner type, for example if partner data is PROFILE, DELIVERY or BRANCH

name: area_id
description: Unique identifier of the geographic area in which the partner is located

name: country_id
description: Identifier of the country in which the partner is located

name: registered_date_id
description: Registration date id of partner into PedidosYa, numeric format YYYYMMDD

name: is_vip
description: Is true when the partner currently has a VIP contract

name: is_gold_vip
description: Is true when the partner currently has a Gold Vip contract

name: is_important_account
description: Is true when the partner is defined as an important account in PedidosYa

name: registered_date
description: Registration date of partner into PedidosYa

name: created_date_id
description: Creation date id of the partner in PedidosYa, numeric format YYYYMMDD

name: created_date
description: Creation date of the partner in PedidosYa

name: last_order_date
description: Datetime of the last order generated for partner

name: first_order_date
description: Datetime of the first order generated for partner

name: rut
description: Tax registation number of the partner

name: has_online_payment
description: Is TRUE if the partner has currently set up the online payment method

name: has_stamps
description: Is yes if the partner has currently set up the stamps campaigns

name: has_pos
description: Is yes if the partner has currently set up pos to use in payment method

name: restaurant_street
description: Name of the street where the partner is currently located

name: restaurant_door_number
description: Door number of the building where the partner is currently located

name: restaurant_phone
description: Current Partner Phone Numbers

name: restaurant_owner_contact_name
description: Current Partner owner contact name

name: restaurant_owner_contact_last_name
description: Current Partner owner contact last name

name: restaurant_owner_contact_phones
description: Current Partner owner phones of contact

name: reception_system_name
description: Name of the main reception system in which the order data was received

name: commission
description: It is the commission percentage defined for the restaurant in his billing information (contract)

name: max_shipping_amount
description: Represents the maximum shipment value between the shipping amount of the partner in each of its delivery zones

name: min_delivery_amount
description: Represents the minimum order value requeried to place an order between the delivery amount of the partner in each of its delivery zones

name: publicity_cost
description: It is the amount related to publicity assigned to the business (contract)

name: automation_cost
description: It is the amount related to automation assigned to the business (contract)

name: avg_rating
description: It is the average of the general ratings of the partner

name: main_cousine
description: Main dish of the partner yesterday

name: qty_comments
description: Number of valid reviews for the partner since its first day in PedidosYa

name: is_talent
description: Is TRUE if partner is Talent in BO. This partners appear higher on the search results

name: has_banner
description: Is TRUE if the menu of the partner has a personalised banner on top

name: has_discount
description: Is TRUE if the partner had weekly discounts available on BO yesterday

name: delivery_time
description: Represents the expected delivery time calculated for the partner for yesterday

name: max_delivery_amount
description: Represents the maximum minimum order value requeried to place an order between the delivery amount of the partner in each of its delivery zones

name: min_shipping_amount
description: Represents the minimum shipment value between the shipping amount of the partner in each of its delivery zones

name: qty_zones
description: Number of active delivery zones

name: is_express
description: Is TRUE if the partner is tagged with DELIVERY EXPRESS in BO

name: is_debtor
description: Defines if the partner is debtor

name: contract_number
description: It is the contract number of the partner or of the comercial group

name: has_mov
description: Is TRUE if the variable min_delivery_amount is greater than 0

name: qty_current_gold_vip
description: Qty gold vip contracts currently enabled

name: has_featured_product
description: Is TRUE when the partner currently has a Feature Product contract enabled

name: qty_current_featured_product
description: Qty feature products contracts currently enabled

name: is_logistic
description: Is TRUE if the partner currently delivers with PedidosYa Logistics

name: account_owner
description: Name of account owner of partner, defined by sales team and obtained from Salesforce data

name: address_id
description: Identifier of address in which the partner is located

name: avg_speed
description: It is the average of the speed ratings of the business

name: is_premium
description: Is TRUE if the business is tagged with DELIVERY PREMIUM in BO

name: main_cousine_category_id
description: Identifier of yesterdays main dish of the partner

name: previous_state_id
description: Identifier of state of the partner on the day before yesterday

name: change_state_date_id
description: Identifier of the date of the last change of state of the partner

name: link
description: Contains de suffix to create the link to access to the partner home page in PedidosYa

name: logo
description: Contains the name of the file of the logo of the partner

name: reception_system_enabled
description: Is TRUE if the partner has active the order reception system

name: is_day
description: Is TRUE if the partner is open at least a day at noon

name: is_night
description: Is TRUE if the partner is open at least a day at night

name: city_id
description: Identifer of the city in which de partner is located

name: disabled_reason
description: Reason why the partner was disabled (old)

name: avg_food
description: It is the average of the food ratings of the partner

name: avg_service
description: It is the average of the general service rating of the partner

name: has_custom_photo_menu
description: Is TRUE if at least one of the products of the menu of the partner has custom photo, this means that the products has at least one photo taken by our photographers (not count the stock images)

name: disabled_motive
description: Motive why the partner was disabled

name: has_shipping_amount
description: Is TRUE if at least one of the partners delivery zones has shippment amount distinct to 0

name: orders_reception_system_id
description: Identifier of the reception system of the restaurant

name: orders_secondary_reception_system_id
description: Identifier of the secondary reception system of the restaurant

name: logistics_commission
description: It is the commission by logistic concept

name: has_restaurant_portal
description: is TRUE if the partner has access to partner portal

name: dispatch_current_month
description: Is TRUE if from all orders CONFIRMED on the current month, at least one of them has dispatch date

name: sap_id
description: Unique identifier of the partner in SAP

name: commission_restaurant
description: Percentage commission of the partner

name: first_date_online
description: First day online of the partner

name: delivery_type
description: Identifier of the partners delivery type (1=delivery, 2=pick up, 3= all)

name: email
description: Current principal mail address of the partner

name: business_type
description: Current business type of the partner

name: business_name
description: Current business name of the partner

name: billing_info_id
description: Billing informarion identifier assigned to the partner

name: is_online
description: Is TRUE if the partner is active (variable is_active) or his state is ONLINE or UPDATING (yesterday)

name: is_new_online
description: Is TRUE if the partner was online for the first time yesterday

name: is_offline
description: Is TRUE when the partner is not PENDING and is not ONLINE

name: accepts_vouchers
description: Is TRUE if the partner accepts vouchers (from BO)

name: is_active
description: Is TRUE if the partner has orders CONFIRMED or REJECTED yesterday

name: is_pending
description: Is TRUE if the state of the partner is PENDING

name: is_new_online_logistic
description: Is TRUE if the partner was online for the first time yesterday and it uses PedidosYa logistics

name: is_chain
description: Is TRUE if the partner is part of a comercial brand (from BO)

name: is_new_registered
description: Is TRUE if the partner is a new partner in the system

name: url_site
description: Complete URL of the partners home page in PedidosYa

name: salesforce_id
description: Unique identifier of Partner in SALESFORCE

name: centralized_reception_partner_id
description: Centralized partner identificator. This identificator allows the centralization of the reception system of different partners.

name: affected_by_porygon_events
description: Is TRUE if the partner is set up so that its delivery zones vary depending on some rules determined by the logistics Team (due to the zone estimated delay - qty_orders vs qty_riders_available)

name: affected_by_porygon_optimizations
description: Is TRUE if the partner is set up so that its delivery zones rings adapt on an optimized way after one of the zones changed its size due to lack of riders. If it is FALSE, the rings remain the same even one of them changed it size.

name: public_phone
description: Visible phone to the client from BO

name: automatic_phone
description: Automatic phone from BO

name: last_updated
description: Last update from BO

name: qty_products
description: Qty products in BO (all products and not only active ones)

name: qty_picts
description: Qty products that have photos in BO (all products and not only active ones)

name: parallel_reception_system
description: Is TURE if the partner has more than one reception system that work on parallel

name: qty_custom_picts
description: Qty products of the menu of the partner that have custom photo, this means that it has a photo taken by our photographers (not count the stock images)

name: accepts_and_supports_vouchers
description: Is TRUE if the partner accepts and its reception system supports vouchers

name: qty_picts_portal
description: Qty active products that have photos in partner portal

name: menu_id
description: Identifier of the current menu of the partner

name: declines_but_supports_vouchers
description: Is TRUE if the partner declines vouchers but its reception system supports them

name: concept_id
description: Identifer of concept (when applies)

name: kitchen_id
description: Identifer of kitchen (when applies)

name: is_darkstore
description: Is TRUE if the partner is a darkstore

name: business_category_id
description: Sub-category within the business type of the partner

name: avg_main_cuisine_product_price
description: AVG price of all the products on the menu that are from the main cuisine of the partner (yesterday)

name: accepts_pre_order
description: Is TRUE if the partner accepts pre orders

name: requires_proof_of_delivery
description: Is TRUE if the user is asked to sign (confirm he received it) once he receives the order

name: qty_products_portal
description: Qty active products in partner portal

name: last_heartbeat_primary_rs
description: Date of last heartbeat of primary reception system

name: last_heartbeat_secondary_rs
description: Date of last heartbeat of secondary reception system

name: identity_card_behaviour
description: Indicate if partner needs user identification to delivered

name: single_commission
description: Is TRUE if the partner has single commission in BO

name: shopper_type_id
description: Shopper type identifier

name: audi_load_date
description: Autogenerated with the exact moment of registration of row into table. (datetime UTCâˆ’3 (UYT))
